title: multi-modal-researcher
description: This project is a research and podcast generation workflow using LangGraph and Google's Gemini 2.5. It takes a topic (and optionally a YouTube video), performs web research, analyzes the video, and generates a citation-backed report along with a short podcast summary.

title: Multi-Cloud IaC with Terraform
description: Provisioned and managed infrastructure across AWS, Azure, and GCP using Terraform modules, ensuring cloud-agnostic, scalable, and secure deployments.

title: CI/CD with Security Scanning
description: Implemented CI/CD pipelines integrating SAST, DAST, and container image scanning for secure software delivery using GitHub Actions and Jenkins.

title: Incident Response Automation
description: Developed automated incident response workflows using Python and AWS Lambda, reducing mean time to resolution and improving reliability.
